```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
rtweets <- read.csv("data/code_clan_tweets.csv")
names(rtweets)
nrow(rtweets)
ncol(rtweets)
```


```{r}
# ?exclude certain rows from favorite_counts that are from is_quote
rtweets %>% 
  select(favorite_count) %>% 
  summarise(total = sum(favorite_count))
```



```{r}
rtweets %>%
  summarise(mean_retweet_count = mean(retweet_count, na.rm = TRUE))
```
```{r}
rtweets %>% 
  select(source) %>% 
  group_by(source) %>% 
  summarise(source_types = n())
```



```{r}
rtweets %>% 
  select(favorite_count, media_type) %>% 
  distinct(media_type)
```
